hero.headline: The CRM that matches properties with your clients automatically
hero.subheadline: Tesoro matches new properties with your clients in real-time. As soon as you add a property, you instantly see which clients are interested. You decide what to show.
hero.secondary_headline: Your clients respond inside their private portal
hero.secondary_subheadline: Send the proposals you approve, they receive twice-daily digests and mark interest in one click. Tesoro updates your pipeline instantly.
hero.portal_highlight_1_description: Clients mark "Interested" or "Skip" and leave notes on each listing.
hero.portal_highlight_2_description: Tesoro sends a 2x daily summary with the proposals you approved.
hero.portal_highlight_3_description: Shared history, documents and next steps in one place.

website_showcase.title: A Website That Truly Fits Your Agency
website_showcase.description: Fast, secure and beautiful. With Tesoro you get a professional real estate website that perfectly matches your office's identity.
website_showcase.benefit_1_description: Choose from all Google Fonts, set your own colors (4 base colors), and determine the order of blocks yourself. Template power, custom appearance.
website_showcase.benefit_2_description: Built with modern technology (Astro + Cloudflare). Your website loads faster than your competitors'.
website_showcase.benefit_3_description: GDPR-compliant, secure Cloudflare hosting, automatic SSL certificates and daily backups.
website_showcase.benefit_4_description: Fully responsive design that looks amazing on desktop, tablet and mobile. Optimized for all screen sizes.
website_showcase.tech_astro_description: Ultra-fast static site generator that builds blazingly fast websites. Perfect for SEO and performance.
website_showcase.tech_payload_description: Modern headless CMS with visual editor. Choose from many blocks, drag them into the desired order. Customize colors and fonts without code.
website_showcase.tech_cloudflare_description: Global CDN network ensures super-fast loading worldwide. Plus free SSL and DDoS protection.
website_showcase.tech_speed_description: Perfect 100/100 Lighthouse score. Your website loads faster than your competitors'.
website_showcase.tech_seo_description: Fully optimized for search engines. Better Google rankings without extra work.

competitor_comparison.title: Why agencies switch from Sooprema to Tesoro?
competitor_comparison.subtitle: Not because Sooprema is bad. But because Tesoro has more modern UI, faster development, and transparent pricing.
competitor_comparison.feature_1_description: Sooprema: outdated Excel-like interface. Tesoro: 2024 Kanban pipeline with drag & drop, Gmail/Outlook + WhatsApp integrated.
competitor_comparison.feature_2_description: Sooprema: no real portal. Tesoro: clients mark interest in real-time, you see who's active.
competitor_comparison.feature_3_description: Sooprema €29-99 + €299 website. Tesoro: €99 flat, unlimited properties, website included, no surprises.

cocreated.headline: Your ideas actually get built here
cocreated.subheadline: Your feedback doesn't become a ticket that disappears. It becomes a feature within weeks.
cocreated.timeline_title: From idea to reality in weeks, not months
cocreated.comparison_traditional: Traditional CRMs: Feature request → ticket → 18 months → maybe
cocreated.comparison_tesoro: Tesoro: Feature request → conversation → 2 weeks → live
cocreated.cta_benefit: Because a good idea remains a good idea
cocreated.drawer_section_text_why: This feature was crucial because it saves agents time and improves workflow. It solves a daily problem that many customers faced.
cocreated.drawer_section_text_solution: We built a fully integrated solution that works seamlessly within the existing workflow. The feature is now live and used daily by our customers.
cocreated.drawer_timeline_step_2_text: Development and testing with daily updates

testimonials.title: What our customers say

testimonials.testimonial_1_quote: Tesoro CRM has tripled our acquisition ratio. The AI identifies promising properties before they come on the market.
testimonials.testimonial_2_quote: The MLS integration saves us 10+ hours per week. Everything synchronizes automatically, no more double work.
testimonials.testimonial_3_quote: GDPR compliance was always a headache. Now Tesoro handles everything automatically, including document management.

demo.title: See Tesoro CRM in action
demo.description: Discover how our AI-powered lead generation tools help you find more properties, close deals faster and stay compliant.
demo.feature_1: AI lead scoring and predictive analytics

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Tesoro CRM
faq.answer_1: Most customers are operational within 24 hours. Our onboarding wizard imports your existing data and configures everything automatically.
faq.answer_2: We integrate with all major platforms: Funda, Idealista, Kyero, Fotocasa, and 20+ others. Custom integrations are possible.
faq.answer_3: Absolutely. We are GDPR-compliant, use end-to-end encryption and host in EU data centers. SOC 2 Type II certified.
faq.question_4: Can I cancel at any time?
faq.answer_4: Yes, no lock-in contracts. You can cancel monthly and export your data whenever you want.
faq.question_5: How does the AI property matching work?
faq.answer_5: Tesoro's AI analyzes 69+ property attributes and automatically matches properties to buyer requirements in real-time. The system learns from agent feedback and client interactions to improve matching accuracy over time.
faq.question_6: Does Tesoro CRM integrate with Gmail and Outlook?
faq.answer_6: Yes, Tesoro offers native integration with both Gmail and Outlook. All emails are automatically synced, tracked, and linked to the relevant contacts and deals. You can send emails directly from the CRM.
faq.question_7: Can I migrate from my current CRM to Tesoro?
faq.answer_7: Yes, we offer data migration as part of our onboarding service. We can import contacts, properties, and deals from most CRM systems including CSV exports. Our migration team ensures a smooth transition with zero data loss.
faq.question_8: Is there a mobile app or does it work on mobile?
faq.answer_8: Tesoro CRM is fully responsive and works perfectly on all mobile devices through your browser. You get the full CRM experience on phones and tablets without needing to install an app.

lead_workflow.title: You're probably losing valuable leads. Because they're not followed up properly.
lead_workflow.subtitle: Tesoro keeps you sharp throughout the entire process. From qualifying leads to closing deals. You get warned if you let something slip.
lead_workflow.bullet_1: Qualify leads: Tesoro warns you if a lead hasn't been qualified for too long.
lead_workflow.bullet_2: Convert leads: Automatic reminder to convert qualified leads into deals.
lead_workflow.bullet_3: Deal management: Stay on top of what's happening in each deal phase.
lead_workflow.bullet_4: Never drop the ball: Proactive warnings if you let something slip.
lead_workflow.template_option2: I'll call you back later today

hero.title: Simple and Transparent
hero.description: Everything included for one clear price per office. No surprises, no hidden fees.

main_plan.name: Tesoro CRM - Complete Package
main_plan.description: Everything you need for successful real estate CRM. Up to 10 users included.
main_plan.users_note: Need more than 10 users? Contact us for custom pricing.
main_plan.feature_1: Complete CRM with Seller & Buyer Deal Pipelines
main_plan.feature_2: Client portal with photo uploads and 5-star ratings
main_plan.feature_5: Property Management with MLS XML import/export
main_plan.fair_use_description: All features have reasonable usage limits to prevent abuse. With normal usage you won't encounter these limits.
main_plan.upgrade_description: For offices with more than 10 users we offer custom pricing.

services.title: Additional Services
services.description: One-time services to get you started even faster
services.onboarding_description: Migration from your current system, data import, team training and setup assistance. Price depends on complexity.
services.onboarding_includes: Includes: Data migration, system configuration, team training (2 hours), support during onboarding
services.website_description: Custom real estate website design and development. Fully responsive, SEO-optimized and connected to your CRM.
services.website_includes: Includes: Custom design, development, CRM integration, SEO optimization, hosting setup
services.training_description: Additional training sessions, workshops for your team, or in-depth feature training.
services.training_includes: Includes: Customized training, live sessions or recordings, training materials
services.support_description: Priority support via phone, email and chat. Dedicated account manager and SLA guarantees.
services.support_includes: Includes: <1 hour response time, dedicated account manager, monthly review calls, priority feature requests

faq.title: Frequently asked questions about pricing
faq.answer_1: Everything! Complete CRM with Seller & Buyer Deal Pipelines, Client Portal, Smart Matching based on criteria, Email integration, Property Management, Website hosting, Reports, WhatsApp integration, Document storage and basic support. Up to 10 users included.
faq.question_2: What happens if I need more than 10 users?
faq.answer_2: For offices with more than 10 users we offer custom pricing. Contact us and we'll create a suitable quote based on your specific needs.
faq.question_3: What is the Fair Use Policy?
faq.answer_3: All features have reasonable usage limits to prevent abuse (e.g. matching requests, storage, email sending). With normal usage you won't encounter these limits. View the full Fair Use Policy for details.
faq.question_4: Can I add or remove users?
faq.answer_4: Yes, you can add or remove users at any time up to a maximum of 10 users. Above 10 users we need custom pricing.
faq.answer_5: After 14 days you'll automatically be switched to the €99/month subscription. You'll receive a reminder beforehand. No credit card needed during the trial.
faq.answer_6: No, there are no setup fees. You only pay the monthly subscription of €99. Onboarding and migration are optional services (from €495).
faq.question_7: Which payment methods do you accept?
faq.answer_7: We accept all major credit cards, iDEAL, and SEPA direct debit for annual payments.
faq.question_8: Is there a discount for annual payment?
faq.answer_8: Yes, with annual payment you get 2 months free (16% discount). That's €1,188 instead of €1,188. Save €198 per year!
faq.question_9: Can I cancel at any time?
faq.answer_9: Yes, no lock-in contracts. You can cancel monthly and export your data whenever you want.
faq.answer_10: Yes, you can export all your data at any time in CSV or JSON format. You maintain full control over your data.

hero.title: Powerful Tools for Real Estate Professionals
hero.description: From automatic property matching to complete deal management - discover how Tesoro CRM automates your workflow and increases your sales.

features_grid.title: Seven Powerful Features
features_grid.description: Everything you need to automate and optimize your real estate sales.
features_grid.feature_1_description: Real-time smart matching based on budget, location, type and preferences. Matches appear instantly when parameters change or new properties arrive. Approved proposals are emailed to customers 2x per day.
features_grid.feature_2_description: Kanban-style pipeline from Proposed to Closed. Drag & drop functionality.
features_grid.feature_3_description: Customers can mark properties as interesting. Real-time sync with CRM.
features_grid.feature_4_description: Full sync with Gmail and Outlook. All communication linked to deals.
features_grid.feature_5_description: Complete property database with MLS import/export and listing management.
features_grid.feature_6_description: Deal analytics, conversion rates and performance metrics for your team.
features_grid.feature_7_description: Blazingly fast websites built with Astro.Build and PayloadCMS on Cloudflare. Including complete API for third parties.
